title: Celeriac & apple salad with smoked mackerel

ingredients.item: 9 salad onions, trimmed and thinly sliced
2 x 210g packs boneless hot smoked mackerel fillets, skinned

instructions.step: In a large bowl, beat together the mustard, vinegar, crème fraîche and about 3 tbsp warm water. Season and set aside.
Core the apples, then cut them and the celeriac into matchsticks. Add them to the bowl of dressing along with the salad onions and parsley.
Flake in the mackerel and gently fold together. Serve immediately with wedges of the baguette on the side.
